table.comment: table - settings for the Premiums features for a given contribution page
table.name: civicrm_premiums

field.name: entity_table
field.title: Premium Entity
field.comment: Joins these premium settings to another object. Always civicrm_contribution_page for now.

field.name: premiums_active
field.title: Is Premium Active?
field.comment: Is the Premiums feature enabled for this page?

field.name: premiums_intro_text
field.title: Premium Introductory Text
field.comment: Displayed in <div> at top of Premiums section of page. Text and HTML allowed.

field.name: premiums_contact_email
field.title: Premium Contact Email
field.comment: This email address is included in receipts if it is populated and a premium has been selected.

field.name: premiums_contact_phone
field.title: Premiums Contact Phone
field.comment: This phone number is included in receipts if it is populated and a premium has been selected.

field.name: premiums_display_min_contribution
field.title: Display Minimum Contribution?
field.comment: Boolean. Should we automatically display minimum contribution amount text after the premium descriptions.

field.name: premiums_nothankyou_label
field.title: No Thank-you Text
field.comment: Label displayed for No Thank-you option in premiums block (e.g. No thank you)
